    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_107320</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Heat conduction in a metal and plastic spoon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitzeübertragung in einem Metall- und 
Plastiklöffel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conduction de la chaleur dans une cuillère en 
métal et de plastique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Condução do calor em uma colher do metal e do 
plástico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conduzione di calore in un cucchiaio della 
plastica e del metallo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διεξαγωγή θερμότητας σε ένα μέταλλο και ένα πλαστικό
κουτάλι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conducción del calor en una cuchara del metal y 
del plástico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure shows the different temperature sensed by a person's finger when he touches a metal (left) or a plastic (right) spoon.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Conductor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heat transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Insulator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plastic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spoon</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die unterschiedliche 
Temperatur, die durch den Finger einer Person erfaßt wird, wenn er 
ein Metall (nach links) oder einen Plastik (rechten) Löffel berührt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette figure montre la température différente 
sentie par le doigt d'une personne quand il touche un métal (à 
gauche) ou une cuillère (droite) en plastique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta figura mostra a temperatura diferente 
detetada pelo dedo de uma pessoa quando toca em um metal (à esquerda)
ou em uma colher (direita) plástica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa figura mostra la temperatura differente 
percepita dalla barretta della persona quando tocca un metallo (a 
sinistra) o un cucchiaio (di destra) di plastica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο αριθμός εμφανίζει διαφορετική θερμοκρασία που
αισθάνεται από το δάχτυλο ενός προσώπου όταν αγγίζει ένα 
μέταλλο (αριστερά) ή ένα πλαστικό (δεξιά) κουτάλι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta figura muestra la diversa temperatura 
detectada por el dedo de una persona cuando él toca un metal (a la 
izquierda) o una cuchara (derecha) plástica.</string>
          </description>
